properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 1:38PM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 35 knots and waves 12 to 16 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore and open waters of Lake Ontario from
Hamlin Beach to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
